about_the_game:
You awaken on a mysterious spaceship amidst ruins and chaos. Systems are failing, and the dark corridors conceal lurking dangers. But what troubles you most is the strange voice echoing in your head. It calls to you, urging you to venture deeper into the ship, where scientists once conducted perilous experiments on consciousness.

Tsen’tek of the Nyarlath race sought to unlock new potential for his species, willing to risk everything for this goal. But things didn’t go as planned, and now he’s lost control. Each corner ahead holds the consequences of his audacious experiments, but you press on. Explore the ship, make choices at critical moments, and witness how your decisions shape your fate and that of those around you.

IMPROVISE TO SURVIVE

The constant clash between human fragility and the creatures' relentless strength keeps you in suspense. Survival depends not just on your weapon but on mastering the perfect timing to dodge or block incoming attacks.

UNRAVEL THE MYSTERIES OF NYARLATH’S ALIEN SPACESHIP

Immerse yourself in challenging puzzle sequences that demand both logic and creativity, to proceed with the story.
Dive into a variety of unique mini-games that are tied to the controls of spaceship devices.

FIND YOUR FAVORITE GUN

Confront enemies with versatile weapons crafted from salvaged materials, each featuring distinct functionalities—unleash precise shots, wield overwhelming power at the risk of overheating, or freeze foes in their tracks.

INTERACT WITH THE ENVIRONMENT

This spaceship is a living ecosystem, where everything adheres to its designated purpose.
In a variety of extreme conditions, the inhabitants sustain the maintained functions.
Every interaction with these inhabitants will reveal both opportunities and threats.

EXPLORE THE SPACESHIP'S SECRETS

Discover the actively operating and strictly forbidden sections of the spaceship. Be prepared to crawl through the system of technical tunnels and mantle to uncover hidden paths.

content_descriptors.notes: Players can see obscured nudity, dead bodies, and blood.

About the Game

You awaken on a mysterious spaceship amidst ruins and chaos. Systems are failing, and the dark corridors conceal lurking dangers. But what troubles you most is the strange voice echoing in your head. It calls to you, urging you to venture deeper into the ship, where scientists once conducted perilous experiments on consciousness.

Tsen’tek of the Nyarlath race sought to unlock new potential for his species, willing to risk everything for this goal. But things didn’t go as planned, and now he’s lost control. Each corner ahead holds the consequences of his audacious experiments, but you press on. Explore the ship, make choices at critical moments, and witness how your decisions shape your fate and that of those around you.

IMPROVISE TO SURVIVE

The constant clash between human fragility and the creatures' relentless strength keeps you in suspense. Survival depends not just on your weapon but on mastering the perfect timing to dodge or block incoming attacks.

Dive into a variety of unique mini-games that are tied to the controls of spaceship devices.

Discover the actively operating and strictly forbidden sections of the spaceship. Be prepared to crawl through the system of technical tunnels and mantle to uncover hidden paths.
name: Delusion Out of Space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: QuadCore AMD Ryzen 3 3300X / Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (3 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Violência fantasiosa
Linguagem imprópria
Conteúdo sexual

short_description: Delusion Out of Space is a Lovecraftian sci-fi horror shooter where you find yourself trapped after audacious experiments conducted by an alien race. As you explore a spaceship, you make choices at critical moments, decisions that will determine your fate and the lives of those around you.
supported_languages:
English*, Ukrainian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
